= Howto Install with Pecl =

== Unix ==

  # Install [http://pyyaml.org/wiki/LibYAML LibYAML] using your favorite method. For example on a Ubuntu machine `sudo apt-get install libyaml-dev` will get what you need.
  # `sudo pecl channel-discover php-yaml.googlecode.com/svn/pear`
  # `sudo pecl install php-yaml/yaml-beta`
  # Edit your php.ini settings and add "extension=yaml.so"
  # See if it worked with `php --re yaml`
